name: apple-uikit
description: Apple UIKit libraries for Javascript/typescript developers

scripts.build-web-prod: gulp UIBuildWeb ; tsc ; gulp UICleanWebJsFile ; gulp UIMinifyWebProd ; gulp UIBuildWebPackage ; gulp UIRemoveTempFolders
scripts.build-web-dev: gulp UIBuildWeb ; tsc ; gulp UICleanWebJsFile ; gulp UIBuildWebPackage ; gulp UIRemoveTempFolders
scripts.build-web-dev-transpiler: gulp UIBuildWeb --transpiler ; ts-node  --disableWarnings ../../MIOSwiftTranspiler/include/build-bodies/refactor-miojslibs.ts ; gulp UICleanWebJsFile --transpiler ; gulp UIBuildWebPackage --transpiler ; gulp UIRemoveTempFolders --transpiler

author: MIOLabs Team
